variants.name: fur_black
variants.description: This variant, with deep black fur, rules the night, using her natural camouflage to protect her territory from intruders.

variants.name: fur_brown
variants.description: Rich brown fur covers this majestic minotaur, symbolizing her connection to the earth and her role as a guardian of nature.

variants.name: fur_tan
variants.description: Adapted to the harsh desert, this tan-furred minotaur female uses her endurance and strength to lead her tribe in survival.

variants.name: fur_copper
variants.description: This minotaur's shimmering copper fur reflects the sun's rays, dazzling her foes while she defends her young with fierce determination.

variants.name: fur_gold
variants.description: Adorned with golden fur, this wise minotaur is sought after for her sage advice and her magical abilities in gold alchemy.

variants.name: fur_grey
variants.description: With fur as grey as the winter sky, this minotaur wields the power of storms, commanding thunder and wind to protect her clan.

variants.name: fur_white
variants.description: Her white fur blending into the snowy landscape, this minotaur navigates the frozen tundra with ease, guarding the secrets of the ice.

variants.name: light
variants.description: Radiating a gentle, guiding light, this minotaur leads lost travelers to safety, her presence a comforting glow in the dark.

variants.name: amber
variants.description: With fur like molten amber, this minotaur embodies the spirit of the sun, her warmth and radiance inspiring all around her.

variants.name: olive
variants.description: Her fur a deep olive, this minotaur is a healer, using the medicinal plants of the forest to treat her people and allies.

variants.name: taupe
variants.description: Her taupe fur blending with the mountain stone, this minotaur stands unyielding against those who threaten her home.

variants.name: bronze
variants.description: This minotaur's bronze fur shines in battle, her courage and strength forming an impenetrable shield around her loved ones.

variants.name: brown
variants.description: Her deep brown fur echoes the highland soils, and her knowledge of the land makes her a formidable leader and protector.

variants.name: black
variants.description: Majestic in the moonlight, her black fur a cloak of darkness, this minotaur moves silently to guard her realm from nocturnal threats.

variants.name: lavender
variants.description: Infused with the calming scent of lavender, this minotaur soothes the weary and wounded with her gentle presence and healing magic.

variants.name: blue
variants.description: Her blue fur as deep as the ocean, this minotaur commands the waters, her voice as powerful as the crashing waves.

variants.name: zombie_green
variants.description: A chilling sight, her green fur marked by the signs of resurrection, this minotaur has returned from death with newfound dark powers.

variants.name: green
variants.description: Vibrant green fur marks this minotaur as a protector of the ancient woods, her strength key to preserving the natural order.

variants.name: pale_green
variants.description: With fur the color of young leaves, this minotaur brings renewal and growth wherever she roams, healing the land and its creatures.

variants.name: bright_green
variants.description: Her bright green fur is a beacon of life, representing her role as a life-giver and nurturer within her tribe.

variants.name: dark_green
variants.description: This dark green minotaur thrives in the thickest parts of the forest, her presence a sign of the deep, unexplored wilds.

variants.name: zombie
variants.description: Once a great warrior, now resurrected, this zombie minotaur uses her second life to protect her land from those who dare defile it.
